articles.title: Venezuelan Oil Shunned by China as Offers Get More Expensive - Bloomberg.com
articles.description: Chinese buyers shunned offers for Venezuelan crude this week, as a US blockade on the South American producer constrains exports and pushes up prices.
articles.content:
Lea en español
Chinese buyers shunned offers for Venezuelan crude this week, as a US blockade on the South American producer constrains exports and pushes up prices.
